Text.Page:
Are you another of these fools running off toward the Valley of Titans? The last group was gone before I could remind them that there are nothing but Gutrends out there once you pass these gates.

If you're gonna run out there anyway, you may as well arm up and try to find them. Or at least {@LinkCreature:206#1019#Othias}.

I sent him after the last group of fools.

Oh, they're traumatized little fools. They'll be fine in a day or two.

Good of you to come check after them, though.
